Articles.Content:
Love the new Soyuz! I hope this means you are gonna be updating the rest of the soviet pack soon? As always keep up the amazing work!

Where can I get the new Soyuz??

I Present to you: the Kerpollo-Soyuz Test Project! (KSTP)

(just something I did while I was bored)

http://imgur.com/a/WxnI4

Would you be annoyed If I told you I did that and posted the pics on here ages ago?

Where can I get the new Soyuz??

Bobcat posted a mediafire link a few pages back, go hunt for it

edit: here it is,

http://www./download/4kkt1i24zr96dki/Soyuz_Pack_2.zip

Its probably the ECLSS life support mod try removing the life support plugin and folder and see if that helps

I have been trying all kind of things now.. and from what i can find from my fumbling is that there is no way the old Soviet pack can work with the new soyuz pack :/ (This makes me very sad)

Would you be annoyed If I told you I did that and posted the pics on here ages ago?

No, not at all!
Are any of you guys able to have the new Soyuz and Mir working at the same time?
Yes. It's just a matter of setting the configs up right. It's not that hard, MIR is quite easy to move between folders.
Could you pls help me Dragon01 ?

Bobcat posted a mediafire link a few pages back, go hunt for it

edit: here it is,

http://www./download/4kkt1i24zr96dki/Soyuz_Pack_2.zip

Thank you good sir
How much cameras have new soyuz? i can use only 1 target camera but in Bobcats video saw more then one..
The Soyuz instruments arent working with ECLSS AND RPM.

All of Bobcats mods need updating you will just have to wait till he does it, could be 1 day or 6 months he may be holding off till the 0.24 release only he can tell us.

Edited April 15, 2014 by Virtualgenius

All of Bobcats mods need updating you will just have to wait till he does it, could be 1 day or 6 months he may be holding off till the 0.24 release only he can tell us.

No, I mean, IN HIS UPDATE FOR IT...
Anyone else having issues downloading 2.06 from Spaceport? I also can't get mediafire to work, either.
Using mac?

What 2.06 ??

According to Bobcat theres only a version 2.00

maybe mistake file name.

Im repeat look change log

http://gyazo.com/59fcd052e9467d092a517b230940f759.png

Edited April 16, 2014 by Frandsen
It's a fix then.

I don't know. When I download the file it's titled 2.06 and when it's finished, it says that I cannot open the .zip file because it is empty. If it's the same as 2.00 then I already have it, and I didn't see that post by him. Thanks!

Bobcat posted a mediafire link a few pages back, go hunt for it

edit: here it is,

http://www./download/4kkt1i24zr96dki/Soyuz_Pack_2.zip

Has anyone had any success adapting this to career mode? I thought I went through and assigned everything logical tech tree requirements, but I find I'm missing quite a few parts...

Did take a look at it in career mode...quite lovely.

Has anyone had any success adapting this to career mode? I thought I went through and assigned everything logical tech tree requirements, but I find I'm missing quite a few parts...

Did take a look at it in career mode...quite lovely.

I'm pretty sure it is already adapted. It is for me.
There are a number of parts that havent had career mode added in its around 4 or 5 cant remember what they are

Hey guys. I've downloaded everything necessary for the soviet pack to work. The only problem is that the Buran shuttle only flies without the the buran manipulators. Has anyone else this issue? Someone a tip to get this done?

I've got the current 0.23.5 version from steam.

Kind regard!

Disregard, fix was posted after this..

Edited April 18, 2014 by Frandsen
its fixed download romfarers latest robotic arms pack he fixed the plugin dll

There are a number of parts that havent had career mode added in its around 4 or 5 cant remember what they are

Yeah, I had the same. I'll try again. It would be nice for the parts to be laid out in a logical fashion for research.

EDIT: Yeah, the Progress parts don't show up in career mode since they have no tech setting.

Edited April 18, 2014 by Synthesis
